about_the_game:
3 DAYS: Ghosts of War In the heart of the Afghan wilderness, amidst the chaos of war, you awaken to the stark reality of your mission: three days to navigate the perilous landscape, uncover hidden truths, and confront the ghosts of the past. 3 DAYS: Ghosts of War beckons you into a realm where time is your greatest adversary, and every decision carries weight.

This paragraph-based text game thrusts you into the shoes of the protagonist, granting you the power to steer their fate through the unforgiving terrain of Afghanistan. With each choice you make, time slips away, propelling you closer to the critical junctures that will shape the outcome of your mission.



Feel the relentless pulse of time as it drives the narrative forward, imbuing each moment with urgency and tension. Every step you take, every word you speak, inches you closer to the inevitable conclusion of your journey. Yet, in this vast expanse of uncertainty, you hold the key to unlocking multiple endings, each a testament to the complexity of your choices.

Pause the game at will, allowing yourself a moment of respite amidst the turmoil. Strategize your next move, contemplate the ramifications of your actions, and immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of war-torn Afghanistan.



The atmosphere is palpable, suffused with the sights and sounds of conflict. From the desolate valleys to the crumbling ruins, every location pulsates with the echoes of the past, beckoning you to uncover its secrets.

  • Text game where you choose the direction in which you lead the main character.
  • Time pressure - when you play, time is running. When you make choices, you lose a certain amount of time.
  • You can pause the game at any time.
  • Afghanistan and war atmosphere.
  • Multiple endings.
